posts.post_content:
Offered here are 2 1911 S74 silks. The first is a white silk of Oldring with and Old Mill Ad back . This one is very nice with bold brown printing.
The second is a colored silk of Steinfeldt with a Turkey Red Ad at the bottom and deep orange color
Oldring 95.00
Steinfeldt 45.00 Sold

Fist class US mail is free with pay pal friends and family
